headline.main: Portrait of a Master Mariner; The story of Captain Finch, who lived and died in the tradition of the British sailor

lead_paragraph: WORD has just been received in this country of the death of Captain Wilma Finch, master of a British cargo ship, the Chinese Prince. He died as a result of exposure in an open boat several days after his ship was torpedoed somewhere in the bleak latitudes.
abstract: Capt W Finch, typical master mariner described; illus
